diagrams.description: Marketing comprises interconnected disciplines that drive customer engagement and business growth. Digital marketing leverages online channels including SEO, social media, and email campaigns. Brand management builds identity and equity through consistent messaging. Consumer behavior analysis reveals psychological and social purchase drivers. Product development aligns offerings with market needs. Marketing analytics transforms data into actionable insights. Content marketing educates and engages audiences. Customer relationship management nurtures long-term connections through personalized experiences and loyalty programs.
